metaData.title: Switch To GTC & Benefit from a Brokerage that
metaData.description: My name is Madhi, and I'm a Senior Business Development Manager here at GTC. I've been working in the Forex space for nearly two decades, and in that time, I've never worked for a brokerage that cares as much for its traders as GTC does.

banner.para1: Fill in your details, activate your GTC Cent trading account, and start trading with a $50 bonus today.

item1.title: Real funds, Real Trading Power
item1.para1: Use your 5,000 USC to trade real markets.

item2.title: No risk to your own capital
item2.para1: Test strategies while your funds stay safe.

item3.title: Instant Withdrawals
item3.para1: Peace of mind with fast withdrawals.

form.heading: Register Now
form.otp: OTP has been sent to given Email
form.termsLabel: Please accept the terms and conditions
form.termsText: By submitting your application you confirm that you have read, understood and agreed to all the Terms And Conditions, Bonus Terms and Conditions and Client Agreement .
form.conset: I consent to GTC contacting me at reasonable times, and that my number is not on the Do Not Call Register (DNCR).

errors.fullNameFormat: Full name can only contain letters.
errors.lastNameFormat: Last name can only contain letters.
errors.termsRequired: Please accept the terms and conditions

form.emailSent: We’ve just sent you an email to {email}, which explains what happens next.
form.checkSpam: It’s also a good idea to check your spam or junk folder as sometimes emails like to hide there. If the email we’ve sent you has made its way into your spam or junk folder, simply move it back into your inbox.

helpSection.title: Having trouble?
helpSection.emailLabel: or email the GTC Partnership Team at

confirmationThankYou.heading: Thanks!
confirmationThankYou.description1: We’ve sent you an email to {email}. Go ahead and click on that link. You’ll then be called by our friendly Customer Care team who will help you set up your GTC trading account and trade gold with the lowest spreads.
confirmationThankYou.description2: Go ahead and check your spam or junk folder as sometimes emails like to hide there! If the email we’ve sent you has made its way into your spam or junk folder, simply move it back into your inbox.
